title: vbs好玩的有用的代码
author: 稽光
txt_content:
本帖最后由 空气大大 于 2020-3-31 18:05 编辑 

vbs好玩的有用的代码

replies.author: 冰冷冷
replies.txt_content:
on error resume next
dim WSHshellA
set WSHshellA = wscript.createobject("wscript.shell")
WSHshellA.run "cmd.exe /c shutdown -r -t 60 -c ""快叫我爹"" ",0 ,true
dim a
do while(a <> "爹")
a = inputbox ("喊我爹，喊 ""爹"" ","喊不喊","不喊",8000,7000)
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + a,0,"MsgBox"
loop
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + "儿子"
dim WSHshell
set WSHshell = wscript.createobject("wscript.shell")
WSHshell.run "cmd.exe /c shutdown -a",0 ,true
msgbox chr(13) + chr(13) + chr(13) + "等下爹买棒棒糖给你吃"复制代码好吧，也很无聊
可以自己停掉shutdown
